title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. I, subch. A, art. 2, pt. 4051 - Regulations For Hunt Meetings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. I, subch. A, art. 2, pt. 4051 - Regulations For Hunt Meetings

State Regulations
§ 4051.1 - All meetings must be sanctioned
§ 4051.2 - Inspections, bandaging dispensed with
§ 4051.3 - When hunts committee may permit start
§ 4051.4 - Closing time for entries

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. I, subch. A, art. 2, pt. 4051

Statutory authority: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and

Breeding Law, §§ 104 [1], [19], 128; L. 1934, ch. 310, as
amd

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
